board

Class Area

  • java.lang.Object
    • board.Area
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Tile>

    public class Area
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Tile>
    Contains bunch of tile objects. Area objects includes tile objects chosen from grid objects.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Selcuk Gulcan

    • Method Detail

      • addTile

        public void addTile(Tile tile)
        Adds a tile.
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile to be added.

      • removeTile

        public void removeTile(int index)
        Removes a tile at specific index. index numbers are given to tile objects in order of adding them into area objects.
        Parameters:
        index - index of tile to be removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= size())

      • size

        public int size()
        Return number of tile objects the Area has.
        Returns:
        number of tile objects the Area has.
        See Also:
        Tile

      • getRandomTile

        public Tile getRandomTile()
        Gives a random Tile objects in the Area. Uses Math.random method when getting a random Tile.
        Returns:
        Tile object chosen randomly.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the area is empty ( size() == 0)
        See Also:
        Tile

      • getRandomTiles

        public Area getRandomTiles()
        Works just like getRandomTiles(double, double) except the number of random tiles is always presumed to be size().
        See Also:
        getRandomTiles( int)

      • getRandomTiles

        public Area getRandomTiles(int number)
        Returns Area with some Tile objects chosen randomly.
        Parameters:
        number - the number of Tile objects that would be returned.
        Returns:
        Area object with random Tile objects.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if user requests more tiles than area has ( number > size())

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(int index)
        Returns Tile objects at given index.
        Parameters:
        index - Location of the Tile object.
        Returns:
        Tile
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= size())

        Parameters:

        state -
        Returns:

      • find

        public Area find(java.lang.String key,
